entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 12. POP 30%

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of snow overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023
